Description: Optimization of a linear objective function subject to linear equality and inequality constraints.
Solvability: Polynomial time (for small to medium-sized problems)

Description: Optimization of a linear objective function subject to linear constraints where some or all variables are restricted to be integers.
Optimization of a nonlinear objective function subject to nonlinear constraints.
Solvability: Depends on the problem (can be NP-Hard)
Example: Minimizing cost function with nonlinear constraints.

Description: Optimization of a quadratic objective function subject to linear constraints.
Optimization of a linear objective function subject to linear constraints where some variables are continuous and others are integers.
Example: Production planning with discrete and continuous decisions.

Description: Optimization of a convex objective function subject to convex constraints.
Example: Support vector machines in machine learning.

Description: Optimization problems where the variables are discrete and the objective is to find the best combination of these variables.
Optimization of problems by breaking them down into simpler subproblems and storing the results of subproblems to avoid redundant computations.
Solvability: Polynomial time (for problems with optimal substructure and overlapping subproblems)

Description: Optimization of flow in a network subject to capacity constraints.
Solvability: Polynomial time (for problems with specific structures)

Description: Optimization of problems involving uncertainty where some of the data is modeled as random.
Solvability: Depends on the problem (can be NP-Hard)
